thread.section_title: Sunwave gas+power Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sunwave gas+power | www.gosunwave.com
thread.title: Mr. Larry Spears
thread.title_full: Sunwave gas+power reviewed by Mr. Larry Spears

author: Mr. Larry Spears
title: Mr. Larry Spears
text: The cost of electrical bills are higher during the colder months and Sunwave helps customers save money. Not only do i save money thru the winter season, I save money all year long. Sunwave let the customers know when their terms are about to expire so that there are no surprises, such as, charging rates that are through the roof. I've dealt with more than 10 different energy suppliers, and I am very happy with Sunwave rates.
